data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Kevin Denkey (Nimes) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 7, Nimes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to Nimes in their own half.
Nantes needs to be cautious. Nimes have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 9, Nimes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fabio (Nantes) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Corner awarded to Nantes.
In the minute 11, Nantes move into a 1-0 lead through a Andrei header.
Great play from Marcus Coco to set up the goal.
Nimes to take a throw-in in Nantes territory.
In the minute 19, Nimes have been awarded a corner by Hakim Ben el Hadj.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a Nimes throw-in in Nantes's half.
Nantes are whistled for offside.
In the minute 20, Ball safe as Nantes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Nimes in their own half.
Goal kick for Nantes at Stade de la Beaujoire.
In the minute 22, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Nimes in the half of Nantes.
Free kick for Nimes in their own half.
In the minute 25, Corner awarded to Nantes.
An attacking Nantes player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Imran Louza smashes in a penalty at Stade de la Beaujoire. The score is now 2-0.
In the minute 28, Can Nimes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nantes's half?
Hakim Ben el Hadj awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Nimes in the half of Nantes.
In the minute 30, Nimes to take a throw-in in Nantes territory.
Nantes's Randal Kolo Muani gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Nimes defender.
Nantes have been awarded a corner by Hakim Ben el Hadj.
In the minute 31, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Nantes Nantes drive forward through Moses Simon. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Nantes have been awarded a corner by Hakim Ben el Hadj.
In the minute 32, Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to Nimes in their own half.
Throw-in for Nantes in their own half.
Can Nimes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nantes's half?
In the minute 35, Nantes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Loick Landre for Nimes has been booked by Hakim Ben el Hadj and receives a first yellow card.
Kevin Denkey for Nimes drives towards goal at Stade de la Beaujoire. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 36, Nimes's Romain Philippoteaux gets in a shot on goal at Stade de la Beaujoire. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Throw-in Nimes.
Nimes awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 38, Throw-in for Nantes in the half of Nimes.
Can Nantes capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Nimes's half?
Nantes advance rapidly upfield but Hakim Ben el Hadj blows for offside.
In the minute 39, Free kick Nimes.
Throw-in high up the field for Nimes in Nantes.
Ball goes out of play for a Nantes goal kick.
In the minute 43, Nantes have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Nimes at Stade de la Beaujoire.
Ball safe as Nimes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 44, Throw-in for Nimes close to the penalty box.
Randal Kolo Muani gets his shot on target but fails to score for Nantes.
The first-half has ended.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
Nimes make their first substitution with Moussa Kone replacing Yassine Benrahou.
Corner awarded to Nimes.
In the minute 47, Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to Nimes.
The match at Stade de la Beaujoire has been interrupted briefly for a check on Lucas Deaux, who is down injured.
He's off! Imran Louza is shown a red card.
In the minute 50, Nantes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Hakim Ben el Hadj awards the home team a throw-in.
Lucas Deaux is back on the pitch.
In the minute 51, In Nantes, Kevin Denkey (Nimes) misses the target with a header.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Nantes.
Nimes's Lucas Deaux gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 53, Hakim Ben el Hadj awards Nantes a goal kick.
Throw-in Nantes.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to Nimes in their own half.
In the minute 56, Mehdi Abeid is replacing Randal Kolo Muani for the home team.
Throw-in for Nimes in their own half.
Goal! Nimes reduce the deficit to 2-1 through Zinedine Ferhat.
In the minute 57, That's a fine assist from Pablo Martinez.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a throw-in for Nimes, close to Nantes's area.
Throw-in high up the field for Nimes in Nantes.
In the minute 59, In Nantes Nimes attack through Zinedine Ferhat. The finish is off target, however.
Nantes have a goal kick.
In the minute 60, Kevin Denkey is back on his feet again.
Nimes have a dangerous throw-in.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Kevin Denkey.
In Nantes a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 62, In Nantes, Andres Cubas of Nimes is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Throw-in for Nantes at Stade de la Beaujoire.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a Nimes throw-in in Nantes's half.
In the minute 63, Andres Cubas for Nimes drives towards goal at Stade de la Beaujoire. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Nimes have been awarded a corner by Hakim Ben el Hadj.
Nimes pushes forward through Renaud Ripart, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 66, Corner awarded to Nimes.
Free kick for Nantes in their own half.
Nimes to take a throw-in in Nantes territory.
In the minute 68, Corner awarded to Nimes.
Throw-in for Nantes at Stade de la Beaujoire.
Goal kick for Nantes at Stade de la Beaujoire.
In the minute 70, Nimes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to Nimes in their own half.
Throw-in for Nimes close to the penalty box.
In the minute 74, Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to Nimes just outside Nantes's area.
Can Nimes capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Nantes's half?
Throw-in for Nantes in the half of Nimes.
In the minute 75, Christian Gourcuff is making the team's second substitution at Stade de la Beaujoire with Abdoul Kader Bamba replacing Marcus Coco.
The home team replace Ludovic Blas with Renaud Emond.
Free kick for Nimes in their own half.
In the minute 78, Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a throw-in for Nimes, close to Nantes's area.
Haris Duljevic is on a sub for Romain Philippoteaux for Nimes.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a Nimes throw-in in Nantes's half.
In the minute 81, Hakim Ben el Hadj awards Nantes a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Nantes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 82, Free kick for Nantes in their own half.
Can Nantes capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Throw-in Nimes.
In the minute 84, Nantes needs to be cautious. Nimes have an attacking throw-in.
Kevin Denkey (Nimes) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Hakim Ben el Hadj awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 87, In Nantes a free kick has been awarded the away team.
He's off! Fabio is shown a second yellow card.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to Nantes in their own half.
In the minute 89, Sidy Sarr is replacing Pablo Martinez for Nimes at Stade de la Beaujoire.
The home team have replaced Moses Simon with Jean-Charles Castelletto. This is the fourth substitution made today by Christian Gourcuff.
Free kick Nantes.
Hakim Ben el Hadj will wait an extra 6 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Free kick for Nimes in the half of Nantes.
Nimes are coming forward and Haris Duljevic gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Nantes have a goal kick.
Nimes drives forward and Kevin Denkey gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Nimes have been awarded a corner by Hakim Ben el Hadj.
Nimes have been awarded a corner by Hakim Ben el Hadj.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-1.
Alban Lafont (Nantes) has received a first yellow card.
